name: 2-Bit
description:
Top down gameplay... but the controls are flipped differently each level! Control two characters simultaneously and manage their environments. Power sets of batteries, push stuff on buttons, collect keys, open doors, and try to reach the end!

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Space to Grab (yank objects towards you)
  • R to Restart
Credits
  • Programming/Polish by Windzyboy (me)
  • Music made by Binks
  • Various art by IndianaLlama
  • Level Creation by cdslmd
The Deets
  • We're back baby! And this time, we made another chamber-based puzzler!
  • Music recorded live by Binks
  • All other sounds were recorded/edited in the jam period
  • All but 2 textures were premade
    • Ground arrow
    • Grid texture
    • (debatably) 1px HDR
  • I am running on 6 hours of sleep spanning two days hrrnghhhh
  • Please play our game, sorry we don't have a web build, but UE4 doesn't natively support HTML5 anymore.
  • Now open source! (@ GitHub)
